name: azor-icons
description: A collection of React icon components for Azor

scripts.build: svgr --template scripts/svgr-template.js --typescript --svg-props fill=currentColor --svg-props width={props.size} --svg-props height={props.size} --replace-attr-values '#000=currentColor' --replace-attr-values 'black=currentColor' --out-dir src/icons src/raw-icons --no-index && node scripts/generate-index.js && tsc

author: Franco Chipana
